page.title: 09Skipping Rhymes
page.content: ************************************** Spanish Lady Not last night but the night before, twenty_four robbers came knocking at my door,as I went out to let them in this is what they said to me: Spanish lady turn around, Spanish lady touch the ground, Spanish lady do the kicks, Spanish lady do the splits. ************************************** Down the garden Ee{girl or boy name}I am going to tell your mother ,for going down the garden with,{girl or boy name}sat it on your knee asked if it would marry you yes,} no,etc.How many kisses did you get? 1,2 etc How many children did you get, 1,2 etc Did you get a diamond ring yes, no etc. **************************************
